Metier

Class Checkpoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.SwingWorker<java.lang.Object,java.lang.String>
      • Metier.Checkpoint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, java.util.concurrent.Future<java.lang.Object>, java.util.concurrent.RunnableFuture<java.lang.Object>

    public class Checkpoint
extends javax.swing.SwingWorker<java.lang.Object,java.lang.String>
    Version:
    1.04 Class witch launch a detection on each strategic point, and detect if bug is present. It is started in new thread, in background process.
    Author:
    Cyril or Will30 (GitHub) or Will15 (GitLab)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Checkpoint

        public Checkpoint(Metier.Category category,
                  java.util.ArrayList<Metier.StrategicPoint> listSPs,
                  java.util.ArrayList<Metier.Bug> listBugsIntoDatabase,
                  MainPanel MainPanel,
                  java.awt.Color color,
                  org.apache.commons.net.ftp.FTPClient ftpClient,
                  boolean checkFTPMeteoFrance,
                  java.util.ArrayList<Metier.User> listAdminUsers)
        Parameters:
        category - category name checked
        listSPs - strategic point list
        listBugsIntoDatabase - List of all bugs in the database
        MainPanel - panel display which needs to be updated
        color - actually color name
        ftpClient - instance of FTPClient class. Initiated when application starts
        checkFTPMeteoFrance - when application starts, password is required to connect with Meteo France FTP server. True if password is correct, otherwise false
        listAdminUsers - list of users who are administrator. This is for sending alert mails
        Since:
        1.00
